title: The Australian Bicentennial Golf Classic
brief_description: The prestigious and classic Australian golfing event, held at the Royal Melbourne Golf course, is one of Australia’s most important Bicentennial sports event. A sensational field of competitors compete for the highest prize money ever offered in an Australian golfing event. The world’s number one golfer, and one of Australia’s greatest sportsmen, Greg Norman, pairs head to head against “Golfer of the Century” Jack Nicklaus. Includes Roger Davis, Nick Faldo and many more of golf’s champion players.
